skills.name: Use angles around a point with algebra to prove results
Use corresponding angles to form and solve algebraic equations
Derive the fact that interior angles in a quadrilateral add up to 360°

explanations.A: The angles around a point add to 360, so we have m + 100 + 260 - 2m + 2m - n = 360. Simplifying we have m - n + 360 = 360. Subtracting 360 from both sides we have m - n = 0, so m = n
explanations.B: To help you with this question, start by setting up an equation to show that the angles around a point add to 360. Then you can simplify this and rearrange to get the correct equation.
